summary: Minsc can now follow you around Skyrim!
descriptionHtml:
I've been playing Baldur's Gate and decided I wanted my favorite tank to follow me around Skyrim. Just a basic follower for now. He doesn't set off traps, doesn't affect your sneak meter, and is marriable. He is compatible with AFT and should be compatible with other follower mods. If not let me know and I'll try to fix it. You can find him in the Drunken Huntsman in Whiterun.

He also dual-wields whatever you want, just take away his greatsword when you first pick him up. If you already have him, take away 2 handed gear and shields and he should dual-wield whatever is best in his inventory.

Boo WILL be added, I'm working on learning how & getting it worked out, really! I want Boo too! This is all really new to me, so it will take some time, but I really am working on it!

I also have Dynaheir and Imoen, and will add other BG party members as I finish them.
Dynaheir: http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/52177/?
Imoen: http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/52182/?

Let me know if you have any issues or suggestions!
author: RangerRogue
